price: 117. Mpe Nkolo wayo akoki kobebisa mboka moko te, soki bato na yango bazali babongisi.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ لِيُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ بِظُلۡمٖ وَأَهۡلُهَا مُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna rabbuka liyuh'lika al-qurā biẓul'min wa-ahluhā muṣ'liḥūna
